author: Dorothy Johnson
comment: Verizon does what it says, most of the time. Meaning the app! Works great! Awesome tech support! 😄 But not the chat. It pops up when I barely touch to get into the app. Verizon Is my Top choice for products They offer. I don't see the options I once Seen IN the app cuz Then I have to go Really online in my browser, I think. Overall Verizon is The Best 4G etc., etc. Etc, for many of my needs. I can't get to Repair like I used to either at my Odd hours ~

I am beginning to hate Verizon and thinking about going elsewhere. Why can't a big company keep up with the times ???? Plus why do we have so many ads and permissions? Is this BIG BROTHER WATCHING ALL OF US ? HELL.YES !!!!

author: Aaron Gambino
comment: The new "card" layout is very bad. So much wasted space and very ugly. This is not a news app. It also seems fingerprint login is not an option anymore. I would be impressed if Verizon had the foresight to realize this is wrong and just scrap the new design. Consider it a mistake learned from.

author: Michael Carlyle
comment: Terrible redesign. Used to look like a great Android app. Now I don't even know what design it's going for. Go back to the drawing board, Verizon. This is abysmal.

author: Gerrod Herlein
comment: New app design is not visually appealing. Very generic and "cheap" looking. It's slower also. Other design was more user friendly. Don't like that i have to keep logging in. Revert back!

author: A Google User
comment: Went from 5 stars to 1. Who designed the UI? A 14 year old? It's bland, cannot dismiss cards, and reminds me every time I open the app that yes I know I canceled my order. I hate to say it but T-mobile's UI is better at this time.

author: Molly Pfeiffer
comment: This app used to work great for bill paying....but for the last several months I get an error saying "oops something went wrong" and i can't even open the app. Several calls to customer service, was told they would call me back as it was something on their end on my account...still no resolution and never heard back from them. Wish I could just uninstall it.

author: Twanna Robinson
comment: I can't find anything I like about the new look. Can you give us the option to revert back to the prior version? I have to log in EVERY TIME!  Remember me is broken obviously. Just scrap this version. VERY UGLY AND TOO BRIGHT!  Update... I stay logged on now. Still too bright and ugly.

author: Cameron Wolf
comment: The new 'look' is bad and ugly. I really liked the previous one instead of this one.

author: Frank Steinauer
comment: What the hell possessed you to change the app into something so UGLY?! It was user friendly & easy to look at before. Now? Ugh!

author: Hunter D
comment: Took a perfectly good app and made it more cumbersome, along with less features. Would uninstall update, but may as well get used to it because you'll probably be updating this new one a lot.
Last update killed this on my Galaxy S8+. It just sits and spins now. Still not fixed, down to one star. Will no longer work with Wi-Fi enabled.

author: Jeremy Reed
comment: Crashes every time I use it. Whether to view data usage or upgrade my current phones on the plan it will crash at least once during the process.
Tired of it changing all the time... if you want to make a good change, make phone's affordable again

author: Portia Chaney
comment: I live though black & white times  in the 50's & early 60"s  I need to see color like my 4k tv  when I'm looking  at my Verizon  application

What's up with this new app update? Devoid of color, the black and white slapped me in the face when I went to the app. It looks like they've gone back at least 17 years similar to when the background of the phone was dark and text was green.

author: Lisa Gray
comment: I am very frustrated! The app will not remember my sign in. I even tried to set it up for fingerprint. That didn't work either. I held off complaining but it's driving me crazy.  Update: Still having the same issues. I was hoping it would be fixed by now.

author: Larry Saunders
comment: Half the stuff on here you have to wait to use like the platform this really sucks for the money I had to put out

author: Paul Jensen
comment: Unsolicited advertisements that cannot be disabled in the app

author: Trevor Blaner
comment: New update is not as good looking as it used to be. Older version was better more aesthetically pleasing

author: Kathy Pascoe
comment: I do not like the updated app. I can't find where it used to show how much data was used by each individual line.

author: Brian Wheaton
comment: New design is clunky, bland, and slow

author: Lonely Gamer
comment: Please fix the app crashes when trying to pay bill with this app on the pixel 2

author: Dwayne A Ingram Jr
comment: I hate this update!!!!!!!!!! Need to take it back to the old version.
I'm not sure but I've got a  Samsung 7 and I absolutely love it !!!!

author: Laura Tagliaferri
comment: Not used to it yet.

author: Don Dansby
comment: To many ads and annoying  location  nags.

author: Joshua Alley
comment: App keeps crashing when I am on it.

author: Death Trap
comment: Says update, but won't update or open

author: Ethan Lopez
comment: Worst customer service every experienced.

author: chris barry
comment: New update is generic, slow.

author: Tim C
comment: Fails to work too often.

author: Bridgette Migneault
comment: I've always preferred Verizon

author: Dorian Elswood
comment: Cannot understand it why do you keep changing something if it's working fine
It's good. .

author: Dan Quentin James
comment: The app works well on Samsung Galaxy Note.

author: Aaron Kolm
comment: Don't like the new look
Helped me very much

author: Brad Shaffer
comment: A good thourough app.

author: Kelly Wishart
comment: Its boring
